item.title: Lenovo ThinkPad T430s review
item.description: This post covers the second half of my experience moving back to a Linux desktop but I figured it was a good opportunity to focus on the ThinkPad T430s itself as well as the Lenovo ordering experience. If you follow me on Twitter, you know about my service experience. I’ll save that for the end of this post. This post is a little on the long side, so here’s a TL;DR for you if you’re in a big hurry:
